sections.title: I. Investigator Information
sections.description: All study personnel must have human subject education and conflict of interest training completed

fields.label: All Persons Conducting Human Subjects Research
Other Personnel Involved in Design, Conduct, or Reporting
If intramural, what department or fund?
If extramural, what is the name of the sponsor?

options.label: Local investigator as sponsor-investigator (for FDA-regulated studies)

fields.label: Are any of the following used in this study? (check all that apply)
Do FDA regulations for an Investigational New Drug or Investigational Device apply?

options.label: No - For confirmation whether an IND or IDE is necessary, request letter from FDA

fields.label: Will any Schedule I or II drugs be investigated in this study?

options.label: Yes - This use must be approved by the California State Research Advisory Panel

fields.label: Who will obtain approval from California State Research Advisory Panel?

options.label: The sponsor will obtain this approval
I acknowledge: If device is checked, complete the CTC Device Study Worksheet and submit three copies with the original IRB application.

fields.label: Is this a student project? (includes fellows, residents, interns, graduate and undergraduate students)
Will subjects be exposed to any ionizing radiation?

options.label: No - Radiation Safety Committee (RSC) review not required

fields.label: Will participants in this study receive direct medical benefits?
Is the proposed use of radiation/radioactive materials normally considered routine? (Examples: X-ray, nuclear medicine scan)
Will subjects receive a greater radiation dose than patients undergoing routine treatment for the same medical condition?
Does the project involve the creation or use of human embryonic stem cells; the creation or use of human induced pluripotent stem cells; or the introduction of human cells into non-human animals?

options.label: Yes - Letter of approval from SCRO required

fields.label: Are human or animal infectious agents (bacteria, virus, yeast, fungi, prions, rickettsias, parasites, etc.) introduced or manipulated in this study?

options.label: Yes - Letter of approval from IBC required

fields.label: Will recombinant or synthetic nucleic acids, or gene transfer be used?
Will carcinogens, mutagens, nanoparticles, or other toxic or hazardous materials be used?
Is the study being submitted to Public Health Service for sponsorship?

options.label: Yes - PHS policy requires assurance that the composition of the proposed study population benefits all persons at risk

fields.label: Vulnerable Populations
fields.group_start: B. Classification of Subjects (check all that apply)

fields.label: Criteria for exclusion of subjects (other than those opposite the inclusion criteria)

options.label: PI/collaborators will recruit his/her/their own patients/clients/students/employees
PI will send an IRB-approved letter to colleagues asking for referrals
PI will send an IRB-approved letter to colleagues asking to send 'Dear Patient' letters

fields.label: Will recruitment require use of flyers, posters, hand-outs, or other forms of advertising?

options.label: Yes - Attach copy for IRB review/approval

fields.label: Will recruitment require verbal (including telephone) recruitment?

options.label: Yes - Attach script (See Phone Script Elements)

fields.label: Will recruitment involve electronic (web or e-mail) recruiting?
Describe your plan for obtaining consent
What location will be used for the subject to sign the consent?

anchor.paragraph_contains: location will be used for the subject

fields.label: Relative to the performance of research interventions, is consent obtained:

options.label: In conjunction with the performance of research interventions
At a separate appointment from the performance of research interventions

fields.label: Which consent documents are required? (check all that apply)

options.label: Assent of Minor (13-17 yrs old; provide signature with parent on Consent Permission Form)
Assent of Minor (7-12 yrs old; simplified text)
Authorization for Use of Protected Health Information

fields.label: If a consent waiver is requested, select one of the following:

options.label: Waiver of written consent (Provide text of verbal consent)
Waiver of signed consent (Provide text for Information sheet)

fields.label: Amount of inducement being offered to the subjects, if any (include plan for pro-rated payment, if appropriate)
What location will subject-related procedures take place?
Study-related procedures - Potentially Greater than Minimal Risk
List the risks that may result from study-related procedures (Do NOT say 'None' - consider breach of confidentiality or privacy as a risk for all studies)
For studies involving only adults, estimate the magnitude of risks the subject assumes by entering this study:

options.label: Greater than minimal risk (MUST have detailed data safety monitoring plan in protocol)

fields.label: For studies involving children or both children and adults, estimate the magnitude of risks:

options.label: Greater than minimal risk, but holds prospect of direct benefit to subjects
Greater than minimal risk, no prospect of direct benefit, but likely to yield generalizable knowledge

fields.label: State plan for preventing or minimizing these risks
How are this study's safety data monitored?

options.label: By an independent Data and Safety Monitoring Board/Data Monitoring Committee
Other sponsor provided plan for data monitoring

fields.label: State the expected benefits to the subjects (It is acceptable for subjects not to benefit individually in some studies)
State the expected benefits to humanity
Will you collect and store research data electronically?

options.label: No - Research data will not be collected or stored electronically
Yes - Research data will be collected and stored electronically

fields.label: Confirm all required protections are in place:

options.label: Data saved only to a secure storage location (LLU/LLUMC secured server or network)
If portable device used, data saved only if device is encrypted, storage is temporary, and portable device is password protected
Devices and removable media no longer needed will be forwarded to IS for proper destruction

fields.label: If unable to secure the data as indicated above, briefly summarize the reason:
Will you transmit or transport electronic research data?

options.label: No - Electronic research data will not be transmitted or transported
Yes - Electronic research data will be transmitted and/or transported
Email - LLU/LLUMC email system will be used only
Web interface - Only as required/provided by research sponsor
Fax (through system application) - Must be IS approved application
Portable device and/or removable media - Data must be encrypted

fields.label: Will you store research data in hard copy format?

options.label: No - Research data will not be stored in hard copy format
Yes - Research data will be stored in hard copy format

fields.label: Check all security measures that will be taken:

options.label: Data coded by PI or research team with master list secured and kept separately

fields.label: Will any hard copy research data be transmitted (e.g., via fax) or transported?

options.label: No - Hard copy research data will not be transmitted or transported
Yes - Hard copy research data will be transmitted and/or transported
Fax - Cover sheet with confidentiality statement
Courier - Data in sealed envelope marked confidential
Hand-delivery - Data in sealed envelope marked confidential
U.S. Mail or Express Mail service (FedEx, UPS)
Vehicle - Data must not be left in vehicle unattended
Hardcopy data no longer needed will be shredded

fields.label: Will Protected Health Information (PHI) be shared with individuals outside LLUH (the OHCA)?

options.label: No - No PHI will be shared outside LLUH (OHCA) during the course of the research study

fields.label: PHI will be shared with (check all that apply):
If PHI will be shared, what format?

options.label: Recipient will be given PHI - Must be described in consent and PHI Authorization
Recipient will be given data with a linked code
Recipient will be given a Limited Data Set
I certify that all information provided in this application is accurate and complete, and I agree to conduct this research in accordance with IRB requirements.
